title: WW blood scent assists
body: Does WW seriously get assists from just being in the general area?? i somehow find this hard to believe, yet there it is...

replies.body:
ww bloodscent is a targeted ability that is why wards dont grant assists 
same with kalistas thing though its not targeted in the same way
Blood sent gives vision, of course it should grant assists.
And yet wards don't RIP supports.
I never noticed that, I think atleast pink wards should grand assists.
{{champion:429}} if kals w gives vision of a enemy player as they die lets say a jger at blue or red she will get the kill
